testimonials.testimonialText: I was with TXU for 8 years just out of habit. ComparePower showed me I was overpaying by $94 every single month! Switched to a better plan and couldn't be happier. Wish I'd done this years ago.
Reliant kept raising my rates every year. I finally compared and found out I could save $112/month with a different provider. The switch was seamless - no interruption in service at all.

I stayed with TXU because I thought they were the most reliable. Turns out reliability is the same across providers - they all use the same power lines! Now I'm with a cheaper provider saving $87/month.
Green Mountain had me locked into an expensive rate. When my contract ended, ComparePower found me a green energy plan for $73 less per month. Same renewable energy, way better price!
I thought Reliant was giving me a good deal because I'd been a 'loyal customer' for 10 years. They weren't. ComparePower showed me I could save $98/month by switching. Did it in minutes online.
TXU's rates kept creeping up year after year. I finally compared and was shocked - I could save $105/month! Switching was so easy, I wish I'd done it sooner. No more brand loyalty for me!
